title: GridMaterial
description: A material that fills the surface with a two dimensional grid.

cellAlpha.description: The alpha value for the space between grid lines.  This will be combined with the color alpha.

lineCount.description: The number of grid lines along each axis.

lineThickness.description: The thickness of grid lines along each axis, in pixels.

lineOffset.description: The offset of grid lines along each axis, as a percentage from 0 to 1.
